name: Please the Chocomonkey God!
description:
Cooperatively throw ducks and guitars in the chocolate bath to please the increasingly hungry Chocomonkey god!

Credits

Game concept, design, voice and coding by
Per Beijer
Benny Samuelsson
Björn Samuelsson

Music
Steamtech Mayhem by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.or)

Additional sounds and models are CC0 found on BlendSwap and Blender and starter content from UE4.
